description: This file defines the WeatherRepository class, which provides suspend functions to fetch current weather, forecast, location search, and reverse geocoding data from a remote API via NetworkModule. It acts as a data access layer abstracting network calls and handling exceptions.

classes.name: WeatherRepository
classes.description: A repository class providing suspend functions to retrieve weather and location data from a remote API.

methods.name: currentWeather
methods.description: Fetches current weather data for specified location parameters.

methods.name: forecast
methods.description: Retrieves weather forecast data for specified location and number of days.

methods.name: search
methods.description: Searches for locations matching a query string.

methods.name: reverse
methods.description: Performs reverse geocoding to get location details from latitude and longitude.

methods.name: safeCall
methods.description: Executes a suspend block safely, catching exceptions and returning a Result.
